summary: A little House + Farm for the player.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]This is the english translation of the Mod [b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86092/?]Little Farm[/url][/size][/b] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5367106/?]slastik[/url].[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86092/?]
[/url]
Original Description:
This mod adds a small farm with a garden, an animal enclosure, an apiary, a well, a distillery, a greenhouse and a mushroom cellar. Here you can milk cows, shear goats, plant plants, make
wine, create furniture, fish, hunt with a dog, collect various rare items and so on.
A small farm will help you to diversify the gameplay, add new game mechanics and set new goals for you.

It might be not perfect, if you find any mistakes, let me now. :)

Credits

Credits go to slastik for creating this mod.
Thanks to Epervier 666 for hisÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/921/?]ESP-ESM Translator[/url]which I used for the translation.
And a special thanks to Shampa for helping.
[/size][/b]
author: NemonixIX
